name: Taka Taka
description:
Inspired by traditional Japanese folklore, Taka Taka is a rhythm game about surviving the world of Yokai. Play as Tengu and Oni, an unlikely pair with distinct strengths and weaknesses. Battle your way through the waves of hand-drawn enemies, timing your attacks to the exciting music tracks.



With three different levels of difficulty, Taka Taka will always keep you on the edge of your seat! Compete against your friends on the leaderboard, or just focus on beating your high score. There is always more complexity with Taka Taka!



Features:
  • Three Difficulty Levels: Easy, Medium, and DEMON
  • 5 Hand Drawn Zones
  • Steam Deck Compatibility (COMING SOON)
  • Unique music tracks for all 14 levels
  • Friend leaderboards
